name: Powerful Tools
description:
This plugin contains a couple of tools that enpower you to fill your design with random dates, IDs, numbers, Chinese names or English names. It also includes a color palette and a mirror that connects an image to a certain frame.

## Use Mirror Tool

This tool is useful to draw an interaction flow that won't mess up your original layer structure.

1. Open the plugin
2. Select a Rectangle layer
3. Type in the name of an exsiting frame
4. It will use the exported png of the frame to fill the rectangle layer.

---

## Use Table Tool

The table generator requires you to have [PingFang SC] & [Inter] fonts installed or it might not work well.

1. Select a Rectangle layer as the placeholder of the output table
2. Open the plugin
3. Choose table
4. Fill in the content
5. Click "Generate"
